name: Vi
title: the Piltover Enforcer

P.name: Blast Shield

effects.description: Innate: Vi gains a shield equal to 15% of her maximum health for 3 seconds whenever she hits an enemy with an ability.
Blast Shield's cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds for every trigger of Denting Blows.

P.notes: Triggering  Denting Blows will not activate Blast Shield.
P.blurb: Vi charges a shield over time. The shield can be activated by hitting an enemy with an ability.

Q.name: Vault Breaker

effects.description: Active: Vi charges while being slowed by 15% for up to 4 seconds to increase Vault Breaker's range, speed, and damage over the first 1.25 seconds of the channel. Vault Breaker can be recast at any time within its duration.
If the charge completes without reactivation, Vault Breaker is canceled and goes on full cooldown.
Recast: Vi dashes in the target direction, dealing physical damage to all enemies within her path, increased by 0% − 100% (based on channel time).
Vi stops upon colliding with an enemy champion, knocking them back while non-champion enemies hit along her path are instead pulled towards her.
Vault Breaker will go on a 3-second cooldown if the charge is canceled.

Q.notes:
Casting  Flash during the dash will cause enemies at the location to be hit by Vault Breaker.
The following table refers for interactions while Vi is  channeling:

Q.blurb: Vi charges her gauntlets and unleashes a vault shattering punch, carrying her forward. Enemies she hits are knocked back and receive a stack of Denting Blows.

W.name: Denting Blows

effects.description: Passive: Vi's basic attacks on-hit and Vault Breaker apply a stack of Denting Blows to affected enemies for 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times, with the duration refreshing on subsequent applications. The third stack consumes them all to deal bonus physical damage and reduce the target's armor by 20%, with the bonus damage capped at 300 against non-champions.
After triggering Denting Blows, Vi gains bonus attack speed for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent triggers.

W.notes:
The armor penetration will apply after the triggering damage.
The enhanced attack applies other  on-hit effects and can both  critically strike as normal as well as apply  life steal (the bonus damage cannot do either) but does not affect structures.
Denting Blows can be  blocked but cannot be  dodged nor missed while Vi is  blinded.
W.blurb: Vi's punches break her opponent's Armor, dealing bonus damage and granting her Attack Speed.

E.name: Excessive Force

effects.description: Passive: Vi periodically stores up to 2 Excessive Force charges.

Active: Vi's next basic attack within 6 seconds has an uncancelable windup, gains 50 bonus range and deals modified physical damage, as well as deals the same damage to all enemies in a cone in the direction of the target. Excessive Force can critically strike for (75% + 35%) AD bonus physical damage.
Excessive Force resets Vi's basic attack timer.

E.notes:
Excessive Force deals  basic damage to the primary target and  area damage to secondary targets hit by the are of effect.
 Denting Blows will only apply a stack on Excessive Force's primary target (does not interact with the cone's damage).
E.blurb: Vi's next attack blasts through her target, dealing damage to enemies behind it.

R.name: Assault and Battery

effects.description: Active: Vi reveals the target enemy champion and dashes with displacement immunity towards them, dealing them physical damage and knocking them up for 1.25 seconds upon arrival.
Enemies within her path are dealt the same damage, knocked aside by 350 units over 0.25 seconds, and simultaneously stunned for 0.75 seconds.

R.notes:
The  knock up cannot be overridden by other  airborne effects nor can it be ended early by  knockdown effects.
Vi can cast  Flash to reposition herself during the  dash without ending the dash prematurely.
Vi is  unstoppable while  knocking up her primary target but loses it afterwards.
She cannot cast  Flash during this part of the ability.
While charging, Vi's  dash speed ramps up overtime to ensure the target cannot escape.
Vi will track targets that change locations (e.g. by moving,  blinking,  dashing, or being  displaced).
Assault and Battery has a maximum tether range, meaning it does not extensively follow targets that blink too far away (e.g.  Teleport,  Recall).
If the target blinks to a far distance while Vi is dashing, she will stop prematurely but maintain the unstoppability for 7 seconds.*
If the target becomes  untargetable, is too far away, or  dies during Assault and Battery's cast time, the ability will cancel. Assault and Battery does not go on  cooldown nor consume  mana in any of these cases.
However, if Vi is  dashing and the target becomes untargetable, she loses her  unstoppability, stops dashing, and instead walks towards the target forcefully. If she comes into contact with the target, she will apply the  airborne effect but no damage is dealt.
If Vi goes into  resurrection during Assault and Battery's cast time she will still initiate the  dash and apply the  knock up to her target but no damage is dealt.
If Vi however enters  resurrection during the dash, she will stop, but will keep the unstoppability for another 3 seconds after reviving.
Assault and Battery will cancel and go on full cooldown if Vi is affected by  Fear Beyond Death's recast during the cast time.
Vi will apply the knock up and damage even if she  dies while being in range of her target.

R.blurb: Vi runs down an enemy, knocking aside anyone in the way. When she reaches her target she knocks it into the air, jumps after it, and slams it back into the ground.

lore: Once a criminal from the mean streets of Zaun, Vi is a hotheaded, impulsive, and fearsome woman with only a very loose respect for authority figures. Growing up all but alone, Vi developed finely honed survival instincts as well as a wickedly abrasive sense of humor. Now working with the Wardens of Piltover to keep the peace, she wields mighty hextech gauntlets that can punch through walls and suspects with equal ease.

skins.name: Original
skins.lore: Once a criminal from the mean streets of Zaun, Vi is a hotheaded, impulsive, and fearsome woman with only a very loose respect for authority figures. Growing up all but alone, Vi developed finely honed survival instincts as well as a wickedly abrasive sense of humor. Now working with the Wardens of Piltover to keep the peace, she wields mighty hextech gauntlets that can punch through walls and suspects with equal ease.

skins.name: Debonair
skins.lore: Don the yellow power tie and red rose boutonnière of a woman in charge—of herself, her destiny, and the two dozen spines she's going to snap in effortless, elegant style.

skins.name: Demon
skins.lore: One of the great generals of Hell, Vi brutalizes the tormented with acts of martial savagery, arbitrarily raining lazy blows upon the damned. Invoking her in the mortal realm must be done cautiously, as she responds only to a worthy opponent… and only for so long.

skins.name: Warring Kingdoms
skins.lore: Vi is the mighty enforcer of Azir's will—a ferocious, ruthless combatant who thrills in any challenge, no matter how outmatched she may be. Her gauntlets are carved from mystic jade, and each strike connects with the power of a cannon.

skins.name: PROJECT
skins.lore: Street-smart, brash, and always bluntly honest, Vi is a Central detective working to keep law and order in the neon city. Toughened from her days as a lower sector enforcer, Vi keeps the peace with a pair ATLAS gauntlets, and a mean right hook.

skins.name: Heartbreaker

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2019.

skins.lore: Vi plays fast and loose with the rules of love, leaving a long trail of broken hearts (and, sometimes, bodies) in her wake. After many years, she's finally encountered a new rival worthy of her strength… almost too worthy.

skins.name: PsyOps

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 PsyOps event.
This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

skins.lore: A hand-to-hand combat specialist trained in psychically enhancing her blows with her mind, Vi takes care of “hard targets” for the rest of the PsyOps crew… generally by rushing ahead and punching them apart. She will fight anything and everything, including the old bipedal winter mechs from the Arctic Ops event 40 years prior.
